category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_tcsync_object_file_transfer
preference.preference_description: Activates the performance monitoring of the Multi-Site Collaboration object file transfer function by the tc_sync utility. Object file transfer is a subtransaction of the ARM tc_sync update transaction. This transaction reports the duration of time required to transfer the files associated with a remote object to a specific site. There is no corresponding server-side transaction. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the Multi-Site Collaboration object update function by the tc_sync utility. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the Multi-Site Collaboration object update function by the tc_sync utility.
